translations: 窜改；加入（额外的事）（interpolate 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: I will discuss various ways of interpolating the values later in this article.
sentences.translation: 后面将介绍在这些值之间插值的几种方法。

sentences.sentence: In the case of GPU, we can also use interpolating texture units instead of computing some expensive expression.
sentences.translation: 在GPU情况下，我们也能使用中断处理单元替代高昂的计算处理。

sentences.sentence: Estimated positions will be generated by interpolating the tracker position in-between nearby keyed or tracked positions.
sentences.translation: 估计位置将由插值生成的跟踪位置中间的键控或跟踪位置附近。
